name: Pleione Ltd
goal:
Pleione Ltd is an Uk based consultancy firm specialised in
- the optimalisation of subventions for green solutions in transportation
- the social economic development of the retail sector
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: TEN-T, TEN-E, Environment; Climate Change, Environment; Carbon Trading, 2020 Climate and Energy Package
